sn51.29:1.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn51.29:1.2: “katama nu kho, bhante, iddhi, katamo iddhipado, katama iddhipadabhavana, katama iddhipadabhavanagamini patipada”ti?
sn51.29:2.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti—
sn51.29:3.2: Yo, bhikkhave, maggo, ya patipada iddhilabhaya iddhipatilabhaya samvattati—
sn51.29:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
